TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Strings extends System.Object

summary.span: 模組包含用來執行字串作業的程序。

span.span: The module contains procedures used to perform string operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個模組支援的 Visual Basic 語言關鍵字和操作字串的執行階段程式庫成員。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that manipulate strings. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何在其空間將字串分隔。The following example demonstrates how to split a string at its spaces. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#13)]

summary.span: 傳回 值，表示對應至字元的字元碼。

span.span: Returns an value representing the character code corresponding to a character.

.method public static int32 Asc(char String) cil managed
Public Function Asc (String As Char) As Integer
public: static int Asc(char String);

param.name: String
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 任何有效的 或 運算式。

span.span: Any valid or expression.

param.span: 如果 String 為 運算式，則只有字串的第一個字元才會用於輸入。

span.span: If String is a expression, only the first character of the string is used for input.

param.span: 如果 String 為 或者不包含任何字元，則會發生 錯誤。

span.span: If String is or contains no characters, an error occurs.

summary.span: 傳回 值，表示對應至字元的字元碼。

span.span: Returns an value representing the character code corresponding to a character.

returns.span: 傳回 值，表示對應至字元的字元碼。

span.span: Returns an value representing the character code corresponding to a character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Asc` 傳回*程式碼點*，或輸入字元的字元碼。`Asc` returns the *code point*, or character code, for the input character. 這可以是 0 到 255 的單一位元組字元集 (sbcs) 的值介於-32768 至 32767 之間的雙位元組字元集 (dbcs) 的值。This can be 0 through 255 for single-byte character set (SBCS) values and -32768 through 32767 for double-byte character set (DBCS) values. `AscW` 傳回輸入字元的 Unicode 字碼指標。`AscW` returns the Unicode code point for the input character. 這可以是 0 到 65535。This can be 0 through 65535. 傳回的值與目前執行緒的文化特性和字碼頁設定無關。The returned value is independent of the culture and code page settings for the current thread. > [!NOTE] > `AscB`較舊版本的 Visual Basic 的函式傳回一個位元組，而不是一個字元的程式碼。The `AscB` function of earlier versions of Visual Basic returns a code for a byte, rather than a character. 它是主要用來轉換雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有的 Visual Basic 2005 字串都位於 Unicode，和`AscB`不再支援。All Visual Basic 2005 strings are in Unicode, and `AscB` is no longer supported. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`Asc`函數來傳回`Integer`字元對應至每個字串中的第一個字母的代碼。The following example uses the `Asc` function to return `Integer` character codes corresponding to the first letter in each string. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static char Chr (int CharCode);
.method public static char Chr(int32 CharCode) cil managed
Public Function Chr (CharCode As Integer) As Char
public: static char Chr(int CharCode);

param.name: CharCode
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 運算式，表示字元的字碼指標或字元碼。

span.span: An expression representing the code point, or character code, for the character.

summary.span: 傳回與指定的字元碼關聯的字元。

span.span: Returns the character associated with the specified character code.

returns.span: 傳回與指定的字元碼關聯的字元。

span.span: Returns the character associated with the specified character code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非對稱式範圍接受`CharCode`補償儲存體之間的差異`Short`和`Integer`。The asymmetric range accepted for `CharCode` compensates for the storage differences between the `Short` and the `Integer`. 比方說，是-29183`Short`但 +36353 `Integer`。For example, -29183 is a `Short` but +36353 is an `Integer`. 這也有助於與 Visual Basic 6.0 的相容性。This also facilitates compatibility with Visual Basic 6.0. `Chr` 使用類別命名空間，以判斷目前的執行緒是否使用單一位元組字元集 (SBCS) 或雙位元組字集 (DBCS)。`Chr` uses the class in the namespace to determine if the current thread is using a single-byte character set (SBCS) or a double-byte character set (DBCS). 接著會`CharCode`為碼指向適當的集合中。It then takes `CharCode` as a code point in the appropriate set. 範圍可以是 0 到 255 的 SBCS 字元-32768 到 65535 DBCS 字元。The range can be 0 through 255 for SBCS characters and -32768 through 65535 for DBCS characters. 傳回的值取決於目前的執行緒，包含此程式碼頁屬性類別命名空間。The returned value depends on the code page for the current thread, which is contained in the property of the class in the namespace. 您可以取得藉由指定`System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.TextInfo.ANSICodePage`。You can obtain by specifying `System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.TextInfo.ANSICodePage`. `ChrW` 會採用`CharCode`為 Unicode 程式碼的點。`ChrW` takes `CharCode` as a Unicode code point. 範圍是與目前執行緒的文化特性和字碼頁設定無關。The range is independent of the culture and code page settings for the current thread. 從-32768 到-1 的值會視為相同 32768 到 + 65535 的範圍中的值。Values from -32768 through -1 are treated the same as values in the range +32768 through +65535. 從 0 到 31 的數字是與標準無法列印的 ASCII 碼相同。Numbers from 0 through 31 are the same as standard nonprintable ASCII codes. 例如，`Chr(10)`傳回換行字元。For example, `Chr(10)` returns a line feed character. > [!NOTE] > `ChrB`在舊版的 Visual Basic 中的函式會傳回單一位元組。The `ChrB` function in earlier versions of Visual Basic returns a single byte. 它是主要用來轉換雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. Visual Basic 和.NET Framework 中的所有字串都都位於 Unicode，和`ChrB`不再支援。All strings in Visual Basic and the .NET Framework are in Unicode, and `ChrB` is no longer supported. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`Chr`函式，傳回與指定的字元碼相關聯的字元。The following example uses the `Chr` function to return the character associated with the specified character code. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#7)]

span.span: < 0 or > 255 for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有相符的`Match`內找到`Source`、`Filter`函式會傳回空陣列。If no matches of `Match` are found within `Source`, the `Filter` function returns an empty array. 如果發生錯誤`Source`設`Nothing`或不是一維陣列。An error occurs if `Source` is set to `Nothing` or is not a one-dimensional array. 所傳回的陣列`Filter`函式僅包含足夠項目包含相符的項目數目。The array returned by the `Filter` function contains only enough elements to contain the number of matched items. `Compare`引數可以是下列值。The `Compare` argument can have the following values. |常數Constant|描述Description| |-|-| |常數Constant|描述Description| |`CompareMethod.Binary`|執行二進位比較Performs a binary comparison| |`CompareMethod.Text`|執行文字比較Performs a textual comparison| ## Examples 這個範例示範如何使用`Filter`函式。This example demonstrates the use of the `Filter` function. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#24)]

## Remarks 方法也會提供類似的功能。The method also provides similar functionality. 如果您正在格式化的未當地語系化的數字字串，您應該使用使用者定義數值格式，以確保您取得想要的外觀。If you are formatting a nonlocalized numeric string, you should use a user-defined numeric format to ensure that you get the look you want. 如果您嘗試將數字格式而不指定`Style`、`Format`函式會提供類似的功能`Str`函式中，雖然它是國際感知。If you try to format a number without specifying `Style`, the `Format` function provides functionality similar to the `Str` function, although it is internationally aware. 不過，正值的數字格式化為字串時，使用`Format`函式不包含前置空格保留正負號的值，使用這些轉換`Str`函式保留的前置空格。However, positive numbers formatted as strings using the `Format` function don't include a leading space reserved for the sign of the value; those converted using the `Str` function retain the leading space. ## 不同的格式不同的數值Different Formats for Different Numeric Values 數字的使用者定義的格式運算式可以有一到三個以分號分隔的區段。A user-defined format expression for numbers can have from one to three sections separated by semicolons. 如果`Style`引數的`Format`函式包含其中一個預先定義數值格式，則允許只能有一個區段。If the `Style` argument of the `Format` function contains one of the predefined numeric formats, only one section is allowed. |如果您使用If you use|以下是結果This is the result| |-|-| |只有一個區段One section only|格式運算式套用至所有值。The format expression applies to all values.| |兩個區段Two sections|第一個區段套用至正值和零。第二個適用於負數值。The first section applies to positive values and zeros; the second applies to negative values.| |三個區段Three sections|第一個區段套用至正值、 負值，適用於第二個和第三個適用於零值。The first section applies to positive values, the second applies to negative values, and the third applies to zeros.| 下列範例有兩個區段： 第一個定義正值和零; 的格式第二個區段定義負值的格式。The following example has two sections: the first defines the format for positive values and zeros; the second section defines the format for negative values. 因為`Style`引數的`Format`函式接受字串，它以引號括住。Since the `Style` argument of the `Format` function takes a string, it is enclosed by quotation marks. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#18)] 如果您包含沒有兩者之間的分號，遺漏的區段會列印使用正數值的格式。If you include semicolons with nothing between them, the missing section is printed using the format of the positive value. 例如，下列格式顯示正值和負值值第一個區段中使用的格式，並且顯示`Zero`如果值為零。For example, the following format displays positive and negative values using the format in the first section and displays `Zero` if the value is zero. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#19)] ## 預先定義數值格式Predefined Numeric Formats 下表會識別預先定義數值格式名稱。The following table identifies the predefined numeric format names. 這些可能會使用名稱做為使用`Style`引數`Format`函式：These may be used by name as the `Style` argument for the `Format` function: |格式名稱Format name|描述Description| |-|-| |`General Number`、 `G`或 `g``General Number`, `G`, or `g`|顯示含數字沒有千位分隔符號。Displays number with no thousand separator.

例如，`Format(&H3FA, "g")`傳回`1018`。For example, `Format(&H3FA, "g")` returns `1018`.| |`Currency`、 `C`或 `c``Currency`, `C`, or `c`|顯示含千位分隔符號的數字在小數點分隔符號的右邊顯示兩位數。Displays number with thousand separator, if appropriate; displays two digits to the right of the decimal separator. 輸出根據系統地區設定。Output is based on system locale settings.

例如，`Format(1234567, "c")`傳回`$1,234,567.00`。For example, `Format(1234567, "c")` returns `$1,234,567.00`.| |`Fixed`、 `F`或 `f``Fixed`, `F`, or `f`|在小數點分隔符號的右邊顯示至少一個數字向左和兩位數。Displays at least one digit to the left and two digits to the right of the decimal separator.

例如，`Format(1234567, "f")`傳回`1234567.00`。For example, `Format(1234567, "f")` returns `1234567.00`.| |`Standard`、 `N`或 `n``Standard`, `N`, or `n`|在小數點分隔符號的右邊顯示千位分隔符號、 至少一個數字向左與兩位數的數字。Displays number with thousand separator, at least one digit to the left and two digits to the right of the decimal separator.

例如，`Format(1234567, "n")`傳回`1,234,567.00`。For example, `Format(1234567, "n")` returns `1,234,567.00`.| |`Percent`|顯示數字乘以立即在右邊附加百分比符號 （%） 100; 在小數點分隔符號的右邊永遠顯示兩位數。Displays number multiplied by 100 with a percent sign (%) appended immediately to the right; always displays two digits to the right of the decimal separator.

例如，`Format(0.4744, "Percent")`傳回`47.44%`。For example, `Format(0.4744, "Percent")` returns `47.44%`.| |`P`或 `p``P`, or `p`|會顯示含有千位分隔符號乘以 100 百分比符號 （%），用單一空格來附加至右邊和分隔的數字; 在小數點分隔符號的右邊永遠顯示兩位數。Displays number with thousandths separator multiplied by 100 with a percent sign (%) appended to the right and separated by a single space; always displays two digits to the right of the decimal separator.

例如，`Format(0.80345, "p")`傳回`80.35 %`。For example, `Format(0.80345, "p")` returns `80.35 %`.| |`Scientific`|使用標準科學記號標記法，提供兩個有效位數。Uses standard scientific notation, providing two significant digits.

例如，`Format(1234567, "Scientific")`傳回`1.23E+06`。For example, `Format(1234567, "Scientific")` returns `1.23E+06`.| |`E`或 `e``E`, or `e`|使用標準科學記號標記法，提供六個有效位數。Uses standard scientific notation, providing six significant digits.

例如，`Format(1234567, "e")`傳回`1.234567e+006`。For example, `Format(1234567, "e")` returns `1.234567e+006`.| |`D`或 `d``D`, or `d`|包含值的十進位 (基底 10) 格式的數字的字串顯示數。Displays number as a string that contains the value of the number in Decimal (base 10) format. 整數類資料類型支援此選項 (`Byte`， `Short`， `Integer`， `Long`) 只。This option is supported for integral types (`Byte`, `Short`, `Integer`, `Long`) only.

例如，`Format(&H7F, "d")`傳回`127`。For example, `Format(&H7F, "d")` returns `127`.| |`X`或 `x``X`, or `x`|包含值的十六進位 (基底 16) 格式的數字的字串顯示數。Displays number as a string that contains the value of the number in Hexadecimal (base 16) format. 整數類資料類型支援此選項 (`Byte`， `Short`， `Integer`， `Long`) 只。This option is supported for integral types (`Byte`, `Short`, `Integer`, `Long`) only.

例如，`Format(127, "x")`傳回`7f`。For example, `Format(127, "x")` returns `7f`.| |`Yes/No`|顯示`No`如果數字是 0; 否則會顯示`Yes`。Displays `No` if number is 0; otherwise, displays `Yes`.

例如，`Format(0, "Yes/No")`傳回`No`。For example, `Format(0, "Yes/No")` returns `No`.| |`True/False`|顯示`False`如果數字是 0; 否則會顯示`True`。Displays `False` if number is 0; otherwise, displays `True`.

例如，`Format(1, "True/False")`傳回`True`。For example, `Format(1, "True/False")` returns `True`.| |`On/Off`|顯示`Off`如果數字是 0; 否則會顯示`On`。Displays `Off` if number is 0; otherwise, displays `On`.

例如，`Format(1, "On/Off")`傳回`On`。For example, `Format(1, "On/Off")` returns `On`.| ### 智慧型裝置開發人員注意事項Smart Device Developer Notes `Yes/No`， `True/False`，和`On/Off`格式不受支援。The `Yes/No`, `True/False`, and `On/Off` formats are not supported. ## 使用者定義數值格式User-Defined Numeric Formats 下表列出可用來建立使用者定義的數字格式的字元。The following table identifies characters you can use to create user-defined number formats. 這些都可用來建置`Style`引數`Format`函式：These may be used to build the `Style` argument for the `Format` function: |字元Character|描述Description| |-|-| |無None|顯示沒有格式的數字。Displays the number with no formatting.| |(`0`)(`0`)|數字預留位置。Digit placeholder. 顯示數字或零。Displays a digit or a zero. 如果運算式在格式字串中出現零的位置有數字，則會顯示。否則，會顯示在該位置的零。If the expression has a digit in the position where the zero appears in the format string, display it; otherwise, displays a zero in that position.

如果數值有較少的字位數比會是零 （在的小數點任何一邊） 格式運算式，顯示開頭或尾端零。If the number has fewer digits than there are zeros (on either side of the decimal) in the format expression, displays leading or trailing zeros. 如果數值有比小數點右邊位數，有格式運算式在小數點右邊零四捨五入數量一樣多的小數位數為零。If the number has more digits to the right of the decimal separator than there are zeros to the right of the decimal separator in the format expression, rounds the number to as many decimal places as there are zeros. 如果數值有比小數點左邊數字有格式運算式在小數點左邊零顯示未經修改的額外位數。If the number has more digits to the left of the decimal separator than there are zeros to the left of the decimal separator in the format expression, displays the extra digits without modification.| |(`#`)(`#`)|數字預留位置。Digit placeholder. 顯示數字或零。Displays a digit or nothing. 如果運算式的位置有數字其中`#`字元出現在格式字串，它會顯示; 否則會顯示任何資訊的位置。If the expression has a digit in the position where the `#` character appears in the format string, displays it; otherwise, displays nothing in that position.

這個符號的運作方式類似`0`數字預留位置，除了開頭和尾端零，如果不會顯示數值有比有較少的位數`#`格式運算式在小數點分隔符號的任一邊的字元。This symbol works like the `0` digit placeholder, except that leading and trailing zeros aren't displayed if the number has fewer digits than there are `#` characters on either side of the decimal separator in the format expression.| |(`.`)(`.`)|小數預留位置。Decimal placeholder. 小數預留位置可決定小數點左側和右側顯示幾位數字。The decimal placeholder determines how many digits are displayed to the left and right of the decimal separator. 如果格式運算式僅包含`#`這個符號左邊的字元; 小於 1 開頭小數分隔符號的數字。If the format expression contains only `#` characters to the left of this symbol; numbers smaller than 1 begin with a decimal separator. 若要顯示前置零的小數數字，使用零做為第一個數值中小數分隔符號左邊數字預留位置。To display a leading zero displayed with fractional numbers, use zero as the first digit placeholder to the left of the decimal separator. 在某些地區設定中，逗號會做為小數點。In some locales, a comma is used as the decimal separator. 做為小數預留位置在格式化輸出中實際的字元取決於您的系統能辨識的數字格式。The actual character used as a decimal placeholder in the formatted output depends on the number format recognized by your system. 因此，您應該使用句號做為小數預留位置格式中即使您是使用逗號做為小數預留位置的地區設定。Thus, you should use the period as the decimal placeholder in your formats even if you are in a locale that uses a comma as a decimal placeholder. 格式化的字串會出現在格式正確的地區設定。The formatted string will appear in the format correct for the locale.| |(`%`)(`%`)|百分比預留位置。Percent placeholder. 將運算式乘以 100。Multiplies the expression by 100. 百分比字元 (`%`) 會插入格式字串中出現的位置。The percent character (`%`) is inserted in the position where it appears in the format string.| |(`,`)(`,`)|千位分隔符號。Thousand separator. 千位分隔符號分隔百有四個以上的小數點左邊數字。The thousand separator separates thousands from hundreds within a number that has four or more places to the left of the decimal separator. 指定千位分隔符號的標準用法如果格式中包含的千位分隔符號括住數字預留位置 (`0`或`#`)。Standard use of the thousand separator is specified if the format contains a thousand separator surrounded by digit placeholders (`0` or `#`).

千位分隔符號左邊或最右邊的小數分隔符號 （不論是否指定小數） 表示字串中字元"縮放的數字除以 1000，捨入所需。 」A thousand separator immediately to the left of the decimal separator (whether or not a decimal is specified) or as the rightmost character in the string means "scale the number by dividing it by 1,000, rounding as needed." 小於 1,000 但大於或等於 500 的數字顯示為`1`，和數字小於 500 顯示為`0`。Numbers smaller than 1,000 but greater or equal to 500 are displayed as `1`, and numbers smaller than 500 are displayed as `0`. 在這個位置中的兩個相鄰千位分隔符號縮放 1 百萬的係數和其他因數 1,000 每個額外的分隔符號。Two adjacent thousand separators in this position scale by a factor of 1 million, and an additional factor of 1,000 for each additional separator.

以外任何位置，在小數點分隔符號的左邊或右邊的位置，在字串中的多個分隔符號都會直接視為指定要使用千位分隔符號。Multiple separators in any position other than immediately to the left of the decimal separator or the rightmost position in the string are treated simply as specifying the use of a thousand separator. 在某些地區設定，用句點做為千位分隔符號。In some locales, a period is used as a thousand separator. 實際使用做為千位分隔符號在格式化輸出中的字元取決於您的系統能辨識的數字格式。The actual character used as the thousand separator in the formatted output depends on the Number Format recognized by your system. 因此，您應該使用逗號做為千位分隔符號格式中即使您是使用句號做為千位分隔符號的地區設定。Thus, you should use the comma as the thousand separator in your formats even if you are in a locale that uses a period as a thousand separator. 格式化的字串會出現在格式正確的地區設定。The formatted string will appear in the format correct for the locale.

例如，請考慮下列的三個格式字串：For example, consider the three following format strings:

- `"#,0."`100 萬個將數值格式化為字串"100000000"哪些使用千位分隔符號。- `"#,0."`, which uses the thousands separator to format the number 100 million as the string "100,000,000".
- `"#0,."`是使用一千因數 100 萬個將數值格式化為字串"100000"。- `"#0,."`, which uses scaling by a factor of one thousand to format the number 100 million as the string "100000".
- `"#,0,."`哪些使用千位分隔符號和以一千 100 萬個將數值格式化為字串"100000"。- `"#,0,."`, which uses the thousands separator and scaling by one thousand to format the number 100 million as the string "100,000".| |(`:`)(`:`)|時間分隔符號。Time separator. 在某些地區設定，使用其他字元來代表時間分隔符號。In some locales, other characters may be used to represent the time separator. 時間分隔符號，區隔小時、 分鐘和秒數會在格式化時間值時。The time separator separates hours, minutes, and seconds when time values are formatted. 實際使用做為時間分隔符號，在格式化輸出中的字元取決於您的系統設定。The actual character used as the time separator in formatted output is determined by your system settings.| |(`/`)(`/`)|日期分隔符號。Date separator. 在某些地區設定，可能會使用其他字元來代表日期分隔符號。In some locales, other characters may be used to represent the date separator. 日期分隔符號分隔格式化日期值時日、 月和年。The date separator separates the day, month, and year when date values are formatted. 在格式化輸出中的日期分隔符號使用的實際字元取決於您的系統設定。The actual character used as the date separator in formatted output is determined by your system settings.| |(`E-``E+``e-``e+`)(`E-``E+``e-``e+`)|科學格式。Scientific format. 如果格式運算式包含至少一個數字預留位置 (`0`或`#`) 左邊`E-`， `E+`， `e-`，或`e+`，會以科學記號格式顯示的編號和`E`或`e`數目及其指數之間插入。If the format expression contains at least one digit placeholder (`0` or `#`) to the left of `E-`, `E+`, `e-`, or `e+`, the number is displayed in scientific format and `E` or `e` is inserted between the number and its exponent. 左邊的數字預留位置數目會決定指數中的位數。The number of digit placeholders to the left determines the number of digits in the exponent. 使用`E-`或`e-`放置負指數旁邊的減號。Use `E-` or `e-` to place a minus sign next to negative exponents. 使用`E+`或`e+`放置負指數旁邊的減號和正指數旁邊的加號。Use `E+` or `e+` to place a minus sign next to negative exponents and a plus sign next to positive exponents. 您也必須包含這個符號右邊，以取得正確的格式的數字預留位置。You must also include digit placeholders to the right of this symbol to get correct formatting.| |`-` `+` `$` ( )`-` `+` `$` ( )|常值字元。Literal characters. 這些字元會完全按照輸入格式字串中顯示。These characters are displayed exactly as typed in the format string. 若要顯示以上所列以外的字元，前面加上反斜線 (`\`) 或將它括在雙引號 ("")。To display a character other than one of those listed, precede it with a backslash (`\`) or enclose it in double quotation marks (" ").| |(`\`)(`\`)|顯示格式字串中的下一個字元。Displays the next character in the format string. 若要顯示的字元具有特殊意義，做為常值字元，前面加上反斜線 (`\`)。To display a character that has special meaning as a literal character, precede it with a backslash (`\`). 反斜線本身不會顯示。The backslash itself isn't displayed. 使用反斜線，是以雙引號括住的下一個字元相同。Using a backslash is the same as enclosing the next character in double quotation marks. 若要顯示一個反斜線，請使用兩個反斜線 (`\\`)。To display a backslash, use two backslashes (`\\`).

無法將顯示為常值的字元都是格式化的日期和時間格式字元的字元的範例 (`a`， `c`， `d`， `h`， `m`， `n`， `p`， `q`， `s`， `t`， `w`， `y`， `/`，和`:`)，數值格式字元 (`#`， `0`， `%`， `E`， `e`、 逗號和句號)，並將字串格式字元 (`@`， `&`， `<`， `>`，和`!`)。Examples of characters that can't be displayed as literal characters are the date-formatting and time-formatting characters (`a`, `c`, `d`, `h`, `m`, `n`, `p`, `q`, `s`, `t`, `w`, `y`, `/`, and `:`), the numeric-formatting characters (`#`, `0`, `%`, `E`, `e`, comma, and period), and the string-formatting characters (`@`, `&`, `<`, `>`, and `!`).| |(`"``ABC``"`)(`"``ABC``"`)|顯示雙引號內的字串 ("")。Displays the string inside the double quotation marks (" "). 若要從程式碼中的樣式引數中包含字串，您必須使用`Chr(34)`括住該文字 (`34`是引號 （"） 的字元碼)。To include a string in the style argument from within code, you must use `Chr(34)` to enclose the text (`34` is the character code for a quotation mark (")).| ### 舊版程式碼範例Legacy Code Example 下表包含數字的範例格式運算式。The following table contains some sample format expressions for numbers. （這些範例全都會假設您的系統地區設定為美式英文）第一個資料行包含格式字串會包含`Style`引數的`Format`函式; `d`字元會顯示使用者定義的日期格式。The `d` character displays the day in a user-defined date format.| |`Long Time`、 `Medium Time`或 `T``Long Time`, `Medium Time`, or `T`|使用目前文化特性的完整時間格式; 顯示時間通常包括時、 分和秒。Displays a time using your current culture's long time format; typically includes hours, minutes, seconds. 例如，`11:07:31 AM`。For example, `11:07:31 AM`.| |`Short Time` 或 `t``Short Time` or `t`|顯示使用目前文化特性的簡短時間格式的時間。Displays a time using your current culture's short time format. 例如，`11:07 AM`。For example, `11:07 AM`.

`s`字元會以使用者定義的時間格式顯示秒數。The `s` character displays the seconds in a user-defined time format.| |`u`|日期及時間格式化為 GMT 可排序的索引。Formats the date and time as a GMT sortable index. 例如，`2008-03-12 11:07:31Z`。For example, `2008-03-12 11:07:31Z`.| |`U`|格式化日期和時間使用完整日期和長的時間為 GMT。Formats the date and time with the long date and long time as GMT. 例如，`Wednesday, March 12, 2008 6:07:31 PM`。For example, `Wednesday, March 12, 2008 6:07:31 PM`.| |`Y`, `y``Y`, `y`|將日期格式化為年份和月份。Formats the date as the year and month. 例如，`March, 2008`。For example, `March, 2008`.

針對使用 24 小時制的地區設定，則不顯示。For locales that use a 24-hour clock, displays nothing.| |`y`|顯示沒有前置零的年數字 (0-9)。Displays the year number (0-9) without leading zeros. 使用`%y`如果這是使用者定義數值格式中唯一的字元。Use `%y` if this is the only character in your user-defined numeric format.| |`yy`|將年份顯示兩位數數值格式，加上前置零，如果適用的話。Displays the year in two-digit numeric format with a leading zero, if applicable.| |`yyy`|將年份顯示四位數的數值格式中。Displays the year in four-digit numeric format.| |`yyyy`|將年份顯示四位數的數值格式中。Displays the year in four-digit numeric format.| |`z`|顯示沒有前置零的時區時差 (例如， `-8`)。Displays the timezone offset without a leading zero (for example, `-8`). 使用`%z`如果這是使用者定義數值格式中唯一的字元。Use `%z` if this is the only character in your user-defined numeric format.| |`zz`|顯示具有前置零的時區時差 (例如， `-08`)Displays the timezone offset with a leading zero (for example, `-08`)| |`zzz`|顯示完整的時區時差 (例如， `-08:00`)Displays the full timezone offset (for example, `-08:00`)| ### 舊版程式碼範例Legacy Code Example 以下是範例的使用者定義的日期和時間格式來`December 7, 1958, 8:50 PM, 35 seconds`:The following are examples of user-defined date and time formats for `December 7, 1958, 8:50 PM, 35 seconds`: |格式Format|顯示Displays| |-|-| |`M/d/yy`|`12/7/58`| |`d-MMM`|`7-Dec`| |`d-MMMM-yy`|`7-December-58`| |`d MMMM`|`7 December`| |`MMMM yy`|`December 58`| |`hh:mm tt`|`08:50 PM`| |`h:mm:ss t`|`8:50:35 P`| |`H:mm`|`20:50`| |`H:mm:ss`|`20:50:35`| |`M/d/yyyy H:mm`|`12/7/1958 20:50`| ### 智慧型裝置開發人員注意事項Smart Device Developer Notes 裝置的最小時間解析是由裝置製造商所決定。The minimum time resolution for a device is determined by the manufacturer of the device. 如果裝置的時間解析是粗略，`f`格式字元會傳回 0，該裝置上執行時。If the time resolution for the device is coarse enough, the `f` format character returns 0 when run on that device. ## Examples 此範例將示範 `Format` 函式的各種使用方式，以透過 `String` 格式及使用者定義的格式，將值格式化。This example shows various uses of the `Format` function to format values using both `String` formats and user-defined formats. 對於日期分隔符號 (`/`)、時間分隔符號 (`:`) 和 AM/PM 指示器 (`t` 和 `tt`) 而言，系統顯示的實際格式化輸出需視程式碼使用的地區設定而定。For the date separator (`/`), time separator (`:`), and the AM/PM indicators (`t` and `tt`), the actual formatted output displayed by your system depends on the locale settings the code is using. 當時間和日期顯示在開發環境內時，會使用程式碼地區設定的簡短時間格式和簡短日期格式。When times and dates are displayed in the development environment, the short time format and short date format of the code locale are used. > [!NOTE] > 若為使用 24 小時制的地區設定，AM/PM 指示器 (`t` 和 `tt`) 不會顯示任何內容。For locales that use a 24-hour clock, the AM/PM indicators (`t` and `tt`) display nothing. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當省略選擇性的一個或多個引數時，會改用電腦相符的地區設定值。When one or more optional arguments are omitted, the computer's matching regional-settings values are used instead. 相對於貨幣值的貨幣符號的位置取決於系統的地區設定。The position of the currency symbol relative to the currency value is determined by the system's regional settings. > [!NOTE] > 所有設定資訊是都來自應用程式的地區設定。All settings information comes from the locale of the application. 根據預設，這會是在控制台中設定的地區設定。By default, that will be the locale set in the control panel. 不過，它可能會變更以程式設計方式使用.NET Framework 中，但前置零，來自`Number` 索引標籤。However, it may be changed programmatically by using the .NET Framework, except leading zero, which comes from the `Number` tab. `IncludeLeadingDigit`， `UseParensForNegativeNumbers`，和`GroupDigits`引數接受下列 Tri-state 列舉值。The `IncludeLeadingDigit`, `UseParensForNegativeNumbers`, and `GroupDigits` arguments take the following TriState enumeration values. |值Value|描述Description| |-|-| |`TriState.True`|TrueTrue| |`TriState.False`|FalseFalse| |`TriState.UseDefault`|電腦的地區設定The computer's regional settings| ## Examples 下面範例說明如何使用 `FormatCurrency` 函式：The following example illustrates the use of the `FormatCurrency` function. span.span: Returns a string expression representing a date/time value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Date`資料類型一定會包含日期和時間資訊。The `Date` data type always contains both date and time information. Visual Basic 型別轉換的目的，請考慮 1/1/1 (1 年的 1 年) 是中性值的日期和 00:00:00 （午夜） 是中性值的時間。For purposes of type conversion, Visual Basic considers 1/1/1 (January 1 of the year 1) to be a neutral value for the date, and 00:00:00 (midnight) to be a neutral value for the time. 如果您格式化`Date`值為日期/時間字串，`FormatDateTime`中產生的字串不包含中性的值。If you format a `Date` value as a date/time string, `FormatDateTime` does not include neutral values in the resulting string. 例如，如果您要轉換 #1/1/0001 9:30:00 # 字串時，結果為"9:30:00";隱藏的日期資訊。For example, if you convert #1/1/0001 9:30:00# to a string, the result is "9:30:00 AM"; the date information is suppressed. 不過，將日期資訊是仍會出現在原始`Date`值，並可以復原與函式例如`DatePart`。However, the date information is still present in the original `Date` value and can be recovered with functions such as `DatePart`. > [!NOTE] > 如果您要傳入`Expression`引數做`String`常值，`FormatDateTime`會解譯根據應用程式的設定。If you pass the `Expression` argument as a `String` literal, `FormatDateTime` interprets it according to the setting of your application. 不過，如果您將它傳遞為`Date`常值中，使用格式 #mm/dd/yyyy # 因為`FormatDateTime`一律解譯`Date`根據英文 （美國） 文化特性的常值。However, if you pass it as a `Date` literal, use the format #mm/dd/yyyy#, because `FormatDateTime` always interprets a `Date` literal according to the English (US) culture. 這是必要的因為如果應用程式開發時，並使用自動程式化`Date`常值，從某個文化特性，但有不同的文化特性的平台上執行`Date`常值可能不正確剖析。This is necessary because, if an application is developed and coded using `Date` literals from one culture, but is then executed on a platform with a different culture, the `Date` literals could be parsed incorrectly. `NamedFormat`引數必須具有下列設定。The `NamedFormat` argument has the following settings. |常數Constant|描述Description| |-|-| |`DateFormat.GeneralDate`|顯示日期和/或時間。Display a date and/or time. 顯示簡短日期的日期部分。Display a date part as a short date. 如果沒有時間部分，請將它顯示成很長的時間。If there is a time part, display it as a long time. 如果有的話，便會顯示這兩個部分。If present, both parts display.| |`DateFormat.LongDate`|顯示日期，使用您電腦的地區設定中指定的完整日期格式。Display a date using the long date format specified in your computer's regional settings.| |`DateFormat.ShortDate`|顯示使用電腦的地區設定中指定的簡短日期格式的日期。Display a date using the short date format specified in your computer's regional settings.| |`DateFormat.LongTime`|顯示時間使用電腦的地區設定中指定的時間格式。Display a time using the time format specified in your computer's regional settings.| |`DateFormat.ShortTime`|顯示時間使用 24 小時制格式 (hh: mm)。Display a time using the 24-hour format (hh:mm).| ## Examples 這個範例示範如何使用`FormatDateTime`函式。This example demonstrates the use of the `FormatDateTime` function. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

span.span: setting is not valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，`InStr`時剖析字串，會使用函式。Typically, the `InStr` function is used when parsing strings. > [!NOTE] > `InStrB`在舊版的 Visual Basic 中的函式傳回的位元組，而不是字元位置數目。The `InStrB` function in previous versions of Visual Basic returns a number of bytes rather than a character position. 它是主要用來轉換雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有的 Visual Basic 2005 字串都位於 Unicode，和`InStrB`不再支援。All Visual Basic 2005 strings are in Unicode, and `InStrB` is no longer supported. `Compare` 引數設定為︰The `Compare` argument settings are: |常數Constant|值Value|描述Description| |-|-|-| |`Binary`|00|執行二進位比較Performs a binary comparison| |`Text`|11|執行文字比較Performs a text comparison| ## Examples 此範例使用 `InStr` 函式傳回某個字串在另一個字串中第一次出現的位置。This example uses the `InStr` function to return the position of the first occurrence of one string within another. summary.span: 傳回結合包含在陣列中幾個子字串所建立的字串。

span.span: Returns a string created by joining a number of substrings contained in an array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是對等之間`Join`和`Split`函式。There is a parity between the `Join` and `Split` functions. `Join`函式接受字串陣列，並結合使用分隔符號字串，以傳回單一字串。The `Join` function takes an array of strings and joins them using a delimiter string, to return a single string. `Split`函式接受字串，並分隔在分隔符號，以傳回字串陣列。The `Split` function takes a string and separates it at the delimiter, to return an array of strings. 不過，主要差異在於`Join`可以串連字串使用任何分隔符號字串，`Split`只可以分開使用單一字元分隔符號的字串。However, a key difference is that `Join` can concatenate strings with any delimiter string, `Split` can only separate strings using a single character delimiter. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用`Join`函式來建立數個字串的清單。The following example demonstrates how to use the `Join` function to create a list from several strings. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有大寫的字母會轉換成小寫。所有小寫字母和 nonletter 字元都保持不變。Only uppercase letters are converted to lowercase; all lowercase letters and nonletter characters remain unchanged. 管理字串，以便適當地區設定中使用應用程式的大小寫的變更時，此函數會使用應用程式的文化特性資訊。This function uses the application's culture information when manipulating the string so that the case changes are appropriate for the locale in which the application is being used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您的應用程式進行比較或大小寫變更作業的結果為基礎的安全性決策，則此作業，應該使用方法，然後傳遞或如`comparisonType`引數。If your application makes security decisions based on the result of a comparison or case-change operation, then the operation should use the method, and pass or for the `comparisonType` argument. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何文化特性會影響字串在 Visual Basic 中](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md)。For more information, see [How Culture Affects Strings in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md). ## Examples 這個範例會使用`LCase`函數來傳回字串的小寫版本。This example uses the `LCase` function to return a lowercase version of a string. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷中的字元數`str`，使用`Len`函式。To determine the number of characters in `str`, use the `Len` function. 如果在 Windows Forms 應用程式或有任何其他類別中使用`Left`屬性，您必須完整限定的函式與`Microsoft.VisualBasic.Left`。If used in a Windows Forms application, or any other class that has a `Left` property, you must fully qualify the function with `Microsoft.VisualBasic.Left`. > [!NOTE] > `LeftB`函式在舊版的 Visual Basic 中的位元組，而不是字元傳回的字串。The `LeftB` function in previous versions of Visual Basic returns a string in bytes rather than characters. 它是主要用來轉換雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有目前的 Visual Basic 字串都位於 Unicode，和`LeftB`不再支援。All current Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `LeftB` is no longer supported. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何使用`Left`函數傳回的子字串指定`String`。This example demonstrates the use of the `Left` function to return a substring of a given `String`. 類別具有中`Left`屬性，可能需要完整限定`Left`函式。In a class that has a `Left` property, it may be necessary to fully qualify the `Left` function. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 與使用者定義型別和`Object`變數`Len`函式傳回的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。With user-defined types and `Object` variables, the `Len` function returns the size as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回字串的長度。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the string. 如果`Object`包含任何其他類型，它會傳回物件的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。If an `Object` contains any other type, it will return the size of the object as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至物件，表示字串，以位元組為單位的大小，寫入時的 string 欄位至磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in objects to indicate the size of the string, in bytes, when written to disk. `Len`函式使用`VBFixedString`屬性，如果有的話，當決定的大小`Object`變數。The `Len` function uses the `VBFixedString` attribute, if available, when determining the size of `Object` variables. > [!NOTE] > `Len`函式可能無法判斷實際儲存可變長度的字串中的使用者定義資料型別搭配使用時所需的位元組數目。The `Len` function may not be able to determine the actual number of storage bytes required when used with variable-length strings in user-defined data types. > [!NOTE] > `LenB`函式在舊版的 Visual Basic 中為字串，而不是字元傳回的位元組數目。The `LenB` function in earlier versions of Visual Basic returns the number of bytes in a string rather than characters. 它是主要用來轉換雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有目前的 Visual Basic 字串都位於 Unicode，和`LenB`不再支援。All current Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `LenB` is no longer supported. ## 智慧型裝置開發人員注意事項Smart Device Developer Notes `Len`函式只接受`String`和`Object`做為參數的變數。The `Len` function accepts only `String` and `Object` variables as parameters. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回長度`String`。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the `String`. 如果參數是 NULL`Object`參考，此函數會傳回零。If a parameter is a NULL `Object` reference, the function returns zero. 如果`Object`包含任何其他型別，擲回例外狀況。If an `Object` contains any other type, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 這個範例使用 `Len` 傳回字串中的字元數。This example uses `Len` to return the number of characters in a string. 智慧型裝置開發人員注意事項Smart Device Developer Notes `Len`函式只接受`String`和`Object`做為參數的變數。The `Len` function accepts only `String` and `Object` variables as parameters. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回長度`String`。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the `String`. 如果參數是 NULL`Object`參考，此函數會傳回零。If a parameter is a NULL `Object` reference, the function returns zero. 如果`Object`包含任何其他型別，擲回例外狀況。If an `Object` contains any other type, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 這個範例使用 `Len` 傳回字串中的字元數。This example uses `Len` to return the number of characters in a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 與使用者定義型別和`Object`變數`Len`函式傳回的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。With user-defined types and `Object` variables, the `Len` function returns the size as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回字串的長度。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the string. 如果`Object`包含任何其他類型，它會傳回物件的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。If an `Object` contains any other type, it will return the size of the object as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至物件，表示字串，以位元組為單位的大小，寫入時的 string 欄位至磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in objects to indicate the size of the string, in bytes, when written to disk. `Len`函式使用`VBFixedString`屬性，如果有的話，當決定的大小`Object`變數。The `Len` function uses the `VBFixedString` attribute, if available, when determining the size of `Object` variables. > [!NOTE] > `Len`函式可能無法判斷實際儲存可變長度的字串中的使用者定義資料型別搭配使用時所需的位元組數目。The `Len` function may not be able to determine the actual number of storage bytes required when used with variable-length strings in user-defined data types. > [!NOTE] > `LenB`函式在舊版的 Visual Basic 中為字串，而不是字元傳回的位元組數目。The `LenB` function in earlier versions of Visual Basic returns the number of bytes in a string rather than characters. 它是主要用來轉換雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有目前的 Visual Basic 字串都位於 Unicode，和`LenB`不再支援。All current Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `LenB` is no longer supported. ## 智慧型裝置開發人員注意事項Smart Device Developer Notes `Len`函式只接受`String`和`Object`做為參數的變數。The `Len` function accepts only `String` and `Object` variables as parameters. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回長度`String`。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the `String`. 如果參數是 NULL`Object`參考，此函數會傳回零。If a parameter is a NULL `Object` reference, the function returns zero. 如果`Object`包含任何其他型別，擲回例外狀況。If an `Object` contains any other type, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 這個範例使用 `Len` 傳回字串中的字元數。This example uses `Len` to return the number of characters in a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 與使用者定義型別和`Object`變數`Len`函式傳回的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。With user-defined types and `Object` variables, the `Len` function returns the size as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回字串的長度。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the string. 如果`Object`包含任何其他類型，它會傳回物件的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。If an `Object` contains any other type, it will return the size of the object as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至物件，表示字串，以位元組為單位的大小，寫入時的 string 欄位至磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in objects to indicate the size of the string, in bytes, when written to disk. `Len`函式使用`VBFixedString`屬性，如果有的話，當決定的大小`Object`變數。The `Len` function uses the `VBFixedString` attribute, if available, when determining the size of `Object` variables. > [!NOTE] > `Len`函式可能無法判斷實際儲存可變長度的字串中的使用者定義資料型別搭配使用時所需的位元組數目。The `Len` function may not be able to determine the actual number of storage bytes required when used with variable-length strings in user-defined data types. > [!NOTE] > `LenB`函式在舊版的 Visual Basic 中為字串，而不是字元傳回的位元組數目。The `LenB` function in earlier versions of Visual Basic returns the number of bytes in a string rather than characters. 它是主要用來轉換雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有目前的 Visual Basic 字串都位於 Unicode，和`LenB`不再支援。All current Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `LenB` is no longer supported. ## 智慧型裝置開發人員注意事項Smart Device Developer Notes `Len`函式只接受`String`和`Object`做為參數的變數。The `Len` function accepts only `String` and `Object` variables as parameters. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回長度`String`。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the `String`. 如果參數是 NULL`Object`參考，此函數會傳回零。If a parameter is a NULL `Object` reference, the function returns zero. 如果`Object`包含任何其他型別，擲回例外狀況。If an `Object` contains any other type, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 這個範例使用 `Len` 傳回字串中的字元數。This example uses `Len` to return the number of characters in a string. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#33)]

Visual Basic 擁有`Mid`函式和`Mid`陳述式。Visual Basic has a `Mid` function and a `Mid` statement. 兩者的指定數目的字元在字串中, 操作這些項目但`Mid`函式會傳回的字元時`Mid`陳述式會取代字元。These elements both operate on a specified number of characters in a string, but the `Mid` function returns the characters while the `Mid` statement replaces the characters. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Mid 陳述式](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/mid-statement.md)。For more information, see [Mid Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/mid-statement.md). > [!NOTE] > `MidB`函式在舊版的 Visual Basic 中的位元組，而不是字元傳回的字串。The `MidB` function in previous versions of Visual Basic returns a string in bytes rather than characters. 它是主要用來轉換雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有的 Visual Basic 字串都位於 Unicode，和`MidB`不再支援。All Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `MidB` is no longer supported. ## Examples 在此範例中的最後一行會使用這個多載的`Mid`函數從字串傳回的第五個和後續字元。The last line in this example uses this overload of the `Mid` function to return the fifth and subsequent characters from a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，或當`Limit`等於-1，`Split`函式上分割輸入的字串，在每次出現的分隔符號字串，並傳回陣列中的子字串。By default, or when `Limit` equals -1, the `Split` function splits the input string at every occurrence of the delimiter string, and returns the substrings in an array. 當`Limit`參數大於零，`Split`函式會在第一個字串`Limit`-1 出現的分隔符號，並傳回產生的子字串陣列。When the `Limit` parameter is greater than zero, the `Split` function splits the string at the first `Limit`-1 occurrences of the delimiter, and returns an array with the resulting substrings. 例如，`Split("a:b:c", ":")`傳回陣列`{"a", "b", "c"}`，雖然`Split("a:b:c", ":", 2)`傳回陣列`{"a", "b:c"}`。For example, `Split("a:b:c", ":")` returns the array `{"a", "b", "c"}`, while `Split("a:b:c", ":", 2)` returns the array `{"a", "b:c"}`. 當`Split`函式發生兩個分隔符號中的資料列或分隔符號的開頭或結尾的字串，它會將它們解譯為周圍的空字串 ("")。When the `Split` function encounters two delimiters in a row, or a delimiter at the beginning or end of the string, it interprets them as surrounding an empty string (""). 例如，`Split("xx", "x")`傳回陣列，包含三個空白的字串： 一個介於開頭的字串和第一個"x"，其中兩個"x"字串，頭尾包括在內，另一個頭尾包括在內的最後一個"x"和字串的結尾。For example, `Split("xx", "x")` returns the array containing three empty strings: one from between the beginning of the string and the first "x", one from between the two "x" strings, and one from between the last "x" and the end of the string. 此資料表會示範如何選擇性`Delimiter`， `Limit`，和`Compare`參數可以變更的行為`Split`函式。This table demonstrates how the optional `Delimiter`, `Limit`, and `Compare` parameters can change the behavior of the `Split` function. |分割呼叫Split Call|傳回值Return Value| |-|-| |`Split("42, 12, 19")`|{"42," , "12," , "19"}{"42," , "12," , "19"}| |`Split("42, 12, 19", ", ")`|{"42", "12", "19"}{"42", "12", "19"}| |`Split("42, 12, 19", ", ", 2)`|{"42", "12, 19"}{"42", "12, 19"}| |`Split("192.168.0.1", ".")`|{"192", "168", "0", "1"}{"192", "168", "0", "1"}| |`Split("Alice and Bob", " AND ")`|{"Alice 和 Bob"}{"Alice and Bob"}| |`Split("Alice and Bob", " AND ", ,CompareMethod.Text)`|{"Alice"，"Bob"}{"Alice", "Bob"}| |`Split("someone@example.com", "@",1)`|{"someone@example.com"}{"someone@example.com"}| |`Split("someone@example.com", "@",2)`|{"someone"，"example.com"}{"someone", "example.com"}| `Compare`引數可以是下列值。The `Compare` argument can have the following values. |常數Constant|描述Description|值Value| |-|-|-| |`CompareMethod.Binary`|執行二進位比較Performs a binary comparison|00| |`CompareMethod.Text`|執行文字比較Performs a textual comparison|11| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何在其空間將字串分隔。The following example demonstrates how to split a string at its spaces. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#13)] 下列範例會示範如何分割具有多個資料列中的分隔符號字串，並篩選出的空字串。The following example demonstrates how to split strings with multiple delimiters in a row and filter out the empty strings. remarks.format: ## Remarks 比較字串的開頭為第一個字元的英數字元的排序值。The strings are compared by alphanumeric sort values beginning with the first character. 如進一步二進位比較、 文字的比較和排序順序的詳細資訊，請參閱[選項比較陳述式](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-compare-statement.md)。For further information on binary comparisons, textual comparisons, and sort order, see [Option Compare Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-compare-statement.md). `Compare` 引數設定為︰The `Compare` argument settings are: |常數Constant|描述Description| |-|-| |`Binary`|執行二進位比較，根據衍生自內部的二進位表示法的字元的排序次序。Performs a binary comparison, based on a sort order derived from the internal binary representations of the characters.| |`Text`|文字根據執行比較，取決於您的系統的不區分大小寫文字排序順序`LocaleID`值。Performs a text comparison, based on a case-insensitive text sort order determined by your system's `LocaleID` value.| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`StrComp`函式傳回的字串比較的結果。This example uses the `StrComp` function to return the results of a string comparison. remarks.format: ## Remarks 常數`VbStrConv.Wide`， `VbStrConv.Narrow`， `VbStrConv.SimplifiedChinese`， `VbStrConv.TraditionalChinese`， `VbStrConv.Katakana`，和`VbStrConv.Hiragana`可能會導致執行階段錯誤時，它們不會套用，地區設定中使用，但不是一定： 常數`VbStrConv.Katakana`和`VbStrConv.Hiragana`可以用於非日文系統與日文語言套件安裝。The constants `VbStrConv.Wide`, `VbStrConv.Narrow`, `VbStrConv.SimplifiedChinese`, `VbStrConv.TraditionalChinese`, `VbStrConv.Katakana`, and `VbStrConv.Hiragana` can cause run-time errors when used in locales where they do not apply, but not always: the constants `VbStrConv.Katakana` and `VbStrConv.Hiragana` can be used in a non-Japanese system with the Japanese Language Pack installed. 此外，使用常數的`VbStrConv.Wide`和`VbStrConv.Narrow`任何系統上安裝為東亞語言支援。In addition, use of the constants `VbStrConv.Wide` and `VbStrConv.Narrow` is supported on any system with an East Asian language installed. 管理字串，以便適當地區設定中使用應用程式的大小寫的變更時，此函數會使用應用程式的文化特性資訊。This function uses the application's culture information when manipulating the string so that the case changes are appropriate for the locale in which the application is being used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您的應用程式進行比較或大小寫變更作業的結果為基礎的安全性決策，則此作業，應該使用方法，然後傳遞或如`comparisonType`引數。If your application makes security decisions based on the result of a comparison or case-change operation, then the operation should use the method, and pass or for the `comparisonType` argument. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何文化特性會影響字串在 Visual Basic 中](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md)。For more information, see [How Culture Affects Strings in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md). `Conversion` 引數設定為︰The `Conversion` argument settings are: |列舉成員Enumeration member|描述Description| |-|-| |`VbStrConv.None`|不執行轉換Performs no conversion| |`VbStrConv.LinguisticCasing`|使用語言規則來轉換，而非檔案系統 （預設值）。Uses linguistic rules for casing, rather than File System (default). 適用於`VbStrConv.UpperCase`和`VbStrConv.LowerCase`只。Valid with `VbStrConv.UpperCase` and `VbStrConv.LowerCase` only.| |`VbStrConv.UpperCase`|將字串轉換為大寫字元。Converts the string to uppercase characters.| |`VbStrConv.LowerCase`|將字串轉換為小寫字元。Converts the string to lowercase characters.| |`VbStrConv.ProperCase`|將轉換成大寫的字串中的每個字的第一個字母。Converts the first letter of every word in string to uppercase.| |`VbStrConv.Wide` \*`VbStrConv.Wide` \*|將窄 （半形） 字元 （全形） 的寬字元字串中。Converts narrow (half-width) characters in the string to wide (full-width) characters. [!INCLUDE[vbstrconv-wide](~/includes/vbstrconv-wide-md.md)]| |`VbStrConv.Narrow` \*`VbStrConv.Narrow` \*|將寬 （全形） 字元 （半形） 字元在字串中的轉換。Converts wide (full-width) characters in the string to narrow (half-width) characters.| |`VbStrConv.Katakana` **`VbStrConv.Katakana` **|將字串中的平假名字元轉換為片假名字元。Converts Hiragana characters in the string to Katakana characters.| |`VbStrConv.Hiragana` **`VbStrConv.Hiragana` **|將字串中的片假名字元轉換為平假名字元。Converts Katakana characters in the string to Hiragana characters.| |`VbStrConv.SimplifiedChinese` \*`VbStrConv.SimplifiedChinese` \*|將繁體中文字元轉換為簡體中文。Converts Traditional Chinese characters to Simplified Chinese.| |`VbStrConv.TraditionalChinese` \*`VbStrConv.TraditionalChinese` \*|將簡體中文字元轉換為繁體中文。Converts Simplified Chinese characters to Traditional Chinese.| \* 適用於亞洲地區設定。\* Applies to Asian locales. ** 僅適用於 （日文）。** Applies to Japan only. > [!NOTE] > .NET Framework common language runtime 中指定這些常數。These constants are specified in the .NET Framework common language runtime. 如此一來，它們可以用於任何位置的實際值取代程式碼中。As a result, they can be used anywhere in your code in place of the actual values. 大部分可以結合 (比方說， `UpperCase + Wide`)，除非它們是互為獨佔模式 (例如， `VbStrConv.Wide + VbStrConv.Narrow`)。Most can be combined (for example, `UpperCase + Wide`), except when they are mutually exclusive (for example, `VbStrConv.Wide + VbStrConv.Narrow`). 以下是有效的文字分隔字元的適當的大小寫： Null (`Chr$(0)`)，水平索引標籤 (`Chr$(9)`)，換行字元 (`Chr$(10)`)，垂直索引標籤 (`Chr$(11)`)、 換頁字元 (`Chr$(12)`)，歸位字元 (`Chr$(13)`)，空間 （單一位元組字元集） (`Chr$(32)`)。The following are valid word separators for proper casing: Null (`Chr$(0)`), horizontal tab (`Chr$(9)`), line feed (`Chr$(10)`), vertical tab (`Chr$(11)`), form feed (`Chr$(12)`), carriage return (`Chr$(13)`), space (single-byte character set) (`Chr$(32)`). 可以是全形或半形，空間的實際值會依國家/地區為東亞語言的文化特性而異。The actual value for a space, which can be full or half width, varies by country/region for East Asian cultures. ## Examples 這個範例會將文字轉換成小寫字母。This example converts text into all lowercase letters. remarks.format: ## Remarks 小寫字母會轉換成大寫。所有的大寫字母和 nonletter 字元保持不變。Only lowercase letters are converted to uppercase; all uppercase letters and nonletter characters remain unchanged. 管理字串，以便適當地區設定中使用應用程式的大小寫的變更時，此函數會使用應用程式的文化特性資訊。This function uses the application's culture information when manipulating the string so that the case changes are appropriate for the locale in which the application is being used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您的應用程式進行比較或大小寫變更作業的結果為基礎的安全性決策，則此作業，應該使用方法，然後傳遞或如`comparisonType`引數。If your application makes security decisions based on the result of a comparison or case-change operation, then the operation should use the method, and pass or for the `comparisonType` argument. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何文化特性會影響字串在 Visual Basic 中](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md)。For more information, see [How Culture Affects Strings in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md). ## Examples 此範例使用 `UCase` 函式，傳回大寫字母版本的字串。This example uses the `UCase` function to return an uppercase version of a string. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#31)]
